name: Endless Offroad Driving
description:
This game was created to test the performance and capabilities of the Godot game engine when exporting for HTML5. Further it tests an algorithm for the generation of an endless but interesting to traverse landscape.

Future plans:

I am not sure where I want to go with this project. Thinks I might implement:

  • Controller support? UPDATE: Will working be in next upload!
  • Treasure hunt (reach a location and find some landmark. Maybe with an optional time challenge)?
  • Racing elements (race against the clock through some checkpoints)?
  • What are your Ideas? Let me know!

Thank you for playing.
